name: Link

properties.name: AFTER_NEW
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_DELETE
properties.description: Dispatched before a Link is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_DELETE
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_UPDATE
properties.description: Dispatched before a Link is updated. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_UPDATE
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is updated. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_EMBED
properties.description: Dispatched before a Link is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_EMBED
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_UNEMBED
properties.description: Dispatched before a Link is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_UNEMBED
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: BEFORE_MOVE
properties.description: Dispatched before a Link is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_MOVE
properties.description: Dispatched after a Link is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
properties.description: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this Link. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

properties.name: versionState
properties.description: The Version Cue version state of the file.

properties.name: editingState
properties.description: The Version Cue editing state of the file.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the link in the links collection.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The linked object. Can return: Story, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

properties.name: assetURL
properties.description: The asset URL of the linked object.

properties.name: assetID
properties.description: The asset ID of the linked object.

properties.name: edited
properties.description: If true, indicates the linked object has been edited in the current document but the source file has not been updated.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the Link.

properties.name: needed
properties.description: If true, indicates a link to a full-resolution version of the source file is needed. If false, indicates the object is embedded.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the link.

properties.name: linkType
properties.description: The file type of the linked object.

properties.name: date
properties.description: The date and time the Link was created.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the Link file.

properties.name: filePath
properties.description: The file path (colon delimited on the Mac OS). Can also accept: File.

properties.name: renditionData
properties.description: The rendition data of the link resource.

properties.name: linkResourceURI
properties.description: The URI of the linked resource.

properties.name: linkXmp
properties.description: XMP data for the link source file.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the Link.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: links
properties.description: A collection of links.

properties.name: preferences
properties.description: A collection of preferences objects.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: checkIn
methods.description: Check in to Version Cue.

methods.name: relink

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The full path name of the new source file. Can accept: File or String.

methods.description: Points the link to a new source file.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Embeds the source file in the document.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the link if the source file has been changed.

methods.name: unembed

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The folder to which to copy the unembedded file. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Unembeds the source file. If no folder is specified, creates a link to the original source file; if a folder is specified, copies the file to the folder and creates a link to the copied file.

methods.name: editOriginal
methods.description: Opens the source file of the link in the default editor for the source file type.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Selects the link.

methods.name: revealInSystem
methods.description: Opens the file system to the folder that contains the source file of the link, and selects the file.

methods.name: revealInBridge
methods.description: Opens Adobe Bridge and selects the source file of the link.

methods.name: copyLink

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The file or folder to which to copy the file.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Copies the link file to the specified location.

methods.name: goToSource
methods.description: Opens the source file of the link in InDesign for SharedContent links.

methods.name: replaceWithOriginal
methods.description: Experimental: Download the original asset and replace FPO with it.

methods.name: relinkTextFragmentLink

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The tag name for the key. (Optional)

methods.description: Experimental: Relink the text fragment link to a new uri

methods.name: reinitLink
methods.description: Experimental: Reinitialize the link to a new uri

methods.name: insertLabel
methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: extractLabel
methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Link.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

methods.name: toSpecifier
methods.description: Retrieves the object specifier.

methods.name: addEventListener

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

methods.description: Adds an event listener.

methods.name: removeEventListener

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

methods.description: Removes the event listener.

description: A link to a placed file.
